timeline.title: Weeks 1 - 5
timeline.content: Offset bug, centered zoom window, refactoring

timeline.title: Week 6
timeline.content: Add crosshair to centered zoom window

timeline.title: Week 10
timeline.content: Sidebar now fits on all resolutions, zoom settings

timeline.title: Week 11
timeline.content: Can no longer open two instances at once, allow the user to select a higher fixation time

timeline.title: Week 12
timeline.content: Actions can be deactivated, sticky left click functionality, increase the max zoom, fix a crash when installing

timeline.title: Week 13
timeline.content: Fix window appearing in the incorrect position with some monitor configurations, crosshair now draws at the bottom of the screen, magnified window now appears over start menu
